about.title: About Me
about.bio: As General Manager at HEC Engineering & Consulting, I specialize in coastal engineering, hydrodynamic analysis, and hydraulic engineering. I develop innovative and sustainable solutions in infrastructure and construction projects, managing pioneering projects worldwide.

about.patentTitle: Guide System Between Floating Pier and Pile Having Springs

project1.title: Haydar Aliyev Park Coastal Structures Hydrodynamic Analysis
project1.description: Performance evaluation of coastal structures under wave effects using numerical analysis; hydrodynamic sensitivities in coastal layout, pier/mooring arrangement, and critical areas were technically assessed.

project2.title: AMAN Bodrum Coastal Structures Design Project
project2.description: Site-specific hydrodynamic conditions were evaluated, examining the behavior of coastal structures under wave-current effects, and design adequacy in terms of safety and operational comfort was verified.

project3.title: Thilafushi WtE Facility Seawater Intake Structure
project3.description: Hydrodynamic performance of the seawater intake structure and discharge/diffuser system at Thilafushi Waste-to-Energy facility was evaluated under operational scenarios.

project4.title: Phaselis Ancient City Harbor Walls Protection Structure
project4.description: Wave conditions and nearshore wave transformation around the ancient harbor were evaluated, and coastal protection approach for walls and towers was established through numerical analyses.

project5.title: SIRO Battery Facility Deep Sea Discharge Line
project5.description: Wind-wave climate analysis was performed to generate design met-ocean inputs, followed by development of deep-sea discharge pipeline routing and fundamental design parameters.

project6.title: COTC Complex Seawater Intake and Discharge Lines
project6.description: Seawater intake system and sea discharge line with diffuser approach for cooling water requirements were addressed at detailed design level for Stage-1.

project7.title: Iskenderun Coastal Urban Design Project
project7.description: Interaction of coastal developments with wave-current regime was examined using numerical modeling; hydrodynamic performance of coastal structures and urban design components was evaluated.

project8.title: Florya Atatürk Pavilion Pier Wave Load Analysis
project8.description: Wave climate and extreme conditions were determined; wave transformation was modeled in numerical environment with bathymetry/topography, and wave loads on pile/supporting elements were calculated.

project9.title: Benesta Center Flood Risk Analysis
project9.description: Flood hazard in the project area was analyzed through hydrological and hydraulic assessments, considering rainfall-watershed response and existing drainage/conveyance capacity.

project10.title: PETKIM Rainwater Drainage System Modeling
project10.description: Facility rainwater drainage infrastructure was addressed hydraulically; line capacity adequacy, critical bottlenecks, and overflow risk scenarios were technically evaluated.

project11.title: TCDD Railway Culvert Hydrodynamic Adequacy Analysis
project11.description: Hydrodynamic behavior of the culvert at stream crossing during flood was evaluated using numerical methods; capacity adequacy and critical hydraulic effects were examined.

project12.title: Ozak Bodrum Hotel Project Coastal Regulation
project12.description: Coastal regulation decisions and drainage infrastructure at hotel site were transformed into engineering design, considering site conditions and operational requirements.

project13.title: Hobyo Port Project Hydrodynamic Analysis
project13.description: Wind-wave climate of the project area was developed; wave transformation, harbor agitation, and morphological change trends were evaluated using numerical modeling tools.

project14.title: Aksoy Epique Island Coastal Structures Assessment
project14.description: Performance of existing coastal structures under site-specific hydrodynamic conditions was evaluated; weak points and improvement areas were analyzed using engineering criteria.

project15.title: Pearl of Istanbul Guzelce Marina
project15.description: Hydrodynamic effects and morphodynamic change potential in and around the marina were addressed together; environmental and operational performance of the design was evaluated.

project16.title: Lord Palace Coastal Structures Circulation Analysis
project16.description: Effect of coastal structure layout on water circulation was examined using hydrodynamic analysis methods; stagnation zones and renewal behavior were evaluated scenario-based.

project17.title: BAGFAŞ Seawater Return Line Heat Exchanger Design
project17.description: Heat exchanger solution to be added to return line was evaluated using heat balance approach to keep discharge temperature of cooling seawater compliant with regulatory limits.

project18.title: Kemerkoy Thermal Discharge Engineering Assessment
project18.description: Cooling water intake-return and discharge processes of the facility were evaluated from an engineering perspective, considering hydrodynamic/thermal effects and compliance criteria.

project19.title: Bodrum Coastal Regulation and Morphological Analysis
project19.description: Coastal regulation/artificial beach approach was evaluated through morphological analyses in terms of wave conditions, sediment mobility, and shoreline response.

project20.title: Kusadasi Marina Rehabilitation Project
project20.description: Hydrodynamic conditions and structural performance assessments were carried out within the scope of marina structures rehabilitation works.

project21.title: Mesa Golkoy Bodrum Drainage Infrastructure
project21.description: Design of drainage infrastructure in residential area and capacity assessments were performed using hydraulic modeling methods.
